string-array.name: active_assertive
string-array.item: A doctor is examining the patients.
A thief has stolen his clothes.
All his friends laughed at him.
He has written all the letters.
He was driving a new car.
I am going to write an application.
I must fill in the form.
I wrote a letter to the Headmaster.
Lencho wrote a latter to God.
Mr Das is teaching me English.
Mr. john will teach me English next month .
Mr.saikia bought a new car last month.
My aunt is cooking rice now.
My father wrote a letter to the headmaster.
My friend gave me a letter.
My friend sent me an S.M.S.
Our Principle presided over the meeting.
Our teacher buys books every month.
The boys are playing cricket today.
The boys are playing cricket in the field .
The carelesness of the driver caused the accident
The doctor is examining the patient.
The gardener is watering the plants.
The girl was writing a letter.
The manager will give you a ticket.
The postman delivers letters every morning.
The postman is delivering the letters.
The postman was delivering the letters.
The teacher has appointed him captain.
The teacher is correcting our copies.
They asked the boy many questions.
They invited me to the party.
We made him captain of our team.
We made him chairman of the committee.
We selected him captain of our class.
You must write the answer in ink.
You must write the answer in ink.
You should raise this question now.
